remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會提供公用程式方法，涉及虛擬路徑的一般作業。The class provides utility methods for common operations involving virtual paths. 如需 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項和伺服器程式碼，使用 Web 應用程式根目錄運算子的虛擬路徑波狀符號 （~），常用而不是相對與絕對路徑。For ASP.NET server controls and server code, virtual paths using the Web application root operator, the tilde (~), commonly are used instead of relative and absolute paths. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET Web 專案路徑](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2447f50c-b849-483c-8093-85ed53e7a5bd)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Project Paths](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2447f50c-b849-483c-8093-85ed53e7a5bd). 使用類別，在您需要將應用程式的相對路徑轉換成絕對虛擬路徑，因為可能會在開發自訂的 Web 服務處理常式。Use the class when you need to convert application-relative paths to absolute virtual paths, as might be the case in developing a custom Web service handler. 絕對虛擬路徑的開頭常值斜線符號 （/）。An absolute virtual path starts with the literal slash mark (/). 相對虛擬路徑是相對於應用程式根目錄中，如果它是只波狀符號 （~），或開頭為波狀符號以及雙反斜線 (~\\\\) 或波狀符號和斜線符號 (~ /)。A relative virtual path is relative to the application root directory, if it is just a tilde (~) or starts with the tilde and a double backslash (~\\\\) or the tilde and a slash mark (~/). 進行相對虛擬路徑可讓獨立應用程式的路徑。Making a virtual path relative makes the path independent of the application. 虛擬目錄的應用程式可從此和屬性。The virtual directory for the application can be obtained from the and properties. > [!NOTE] > 類別並不適合進行安全性或標準化。The class is not intended for security or canonicalization purposes. 如需有關 Web 應用程式安全性的詳細資訊，請參閱[概觀的 Web 應用程式的安全性威脅](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/88d61678-f84e-4622-ae80-53128821855a)。For more information about Web application security, see [Overview of Web Application Security Threats](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/88d61678-f84e-4622-ae80-53128821855a). 如需泛型的 URL 處理功能，請參閱。For generic URL processing functionality, see . ##
